message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its worth, I'm offering it at $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, but $10,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $12,000?
Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I am still hoping to find a middle ground. Could we possibly agree on $11,000 for the product?
